content.question: According to the article, experts and scholars believe that the worldwide upsurge of interest in Chinese language and culture will have which of the following impacts?

choices.label: It will encourage more people to become Chinese teachers.
It will attract more foreign tourists and generate wealth.
It will improve mutual understanding between China and other countries.
It will help spread Chinese films and art to other countries.

content.answer: It will improve mutual understanding between China and other countries.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity
